thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: SandRidge says Icahn seeking control without paying premium

title: SandRidge says Icahn seeking control without paying premium
text:
May 29, 2018 / 11:15 AM / in 7 minutes SandRidge says Icahn seeking control without paying premium Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 29 (Reuters) - SandRidge Energy Inc said on Tuesday activist investor Carl Icahn is seeking to gain control of the oil and natural producer without paying an appropriate premium or participating in a competitive process.
Icahn is looking to replace SandRidgeâ€™s board and added two more nominees to his slate after the company expanded the board. (Reporting by Laharee Chatterjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila)
